title: Search results not selected in external jar
description: When using Build 200201151, the search results are not selected in an external jar when searching for references to a specific field. Specifically, when double-clicking on a search result, the first match is not selected.
OB: When double-clicking on a search result, the first match is not selected in an external jar.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Build 200201151.
2. Perform a search for references to a specific field.
3. Double-click on a search result.
4. Observe that the first match is not selected.
